channel.title: Progress being Lost after Crash
channel.description: Hello, I had gotten Really Far today in Black Mesa, 3/4 chapters, But then my game crashed at questionable Ethics, and when I started it up again, I found all progress had been lost up to a area in on a rail :'(. Even auto Saves were not there... Any Help?

item.title: Progress being Lost after Crash
item.dc:creator: Happy_Attack_Dog
item.description:
Hello, I had gotten Really Far today in Black Mesa, 3/4 chapters, But then my game crashed at questionable Ethics, and when I started it up again, I found all progress had been lost up to a area in on a rail :’(. Even auto Saves were not there… Any Help?

Read full topic
